verses.name: Job 5:24
verses.text: And thou shalt know that thy tabernacle shall be in peace; and thou shalt visit thy habitation, and shalt not sin.

verses.name: Job 5:25
verses.text: Thou shalt know also that thy seed shall be great, and thine offspring as the grass of the earth.

verses.name: Job 5:26
verses.text: Thou shalt come to thy grave in a full age, like as a shock of corn cometh in in his season.

verses.name: Job 5:27
verses.text: Lo this, we have searched it, so it is; hear it, and know thou it for thy good.
